original_text: On the next day, Moses saw two Israelite men. They were fighting each other. He tried to make them become friends. He said to them, “Listen to me, men. You are both in the family of Israel. You should not hurt each other.”
korean_text: 이튿날 이스라엘 사람끼리 싸울 때에 모세가 와서 화해시키려 하여 이르되 너희는 형제인데 어찌 서로 해치느냐 하니

sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 이스라엘 사람 두 명을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: He tried to make them become friends
You are both in the family of Israel
You should not hurt each other
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들은 서로에게 상처 주어서는 안 됩니다
